description:
In Devstack:

$ nova aggregate-details badID 

throws a stack trace in the nova-api log

http://paste.openstack.org/show/21012/
title: nova aggregate-details badID throws a stack trace

comments.content:
In Devstack:

$ nova aggregate-details badID 

throws a stack trace in the nova-api log

http://paste.openstack.org/show/21012/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/13322
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/13322
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/6ebe7fd5f0c3fbe9b409f643237be837c5266dea
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 6ebe7fd5f0c3fbe9b409f643237be837c5266dea
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 19 22:27:20 2012 +0000

    No stack trace on bad nova aggregate-* command
    
    When a 'nova aggregate-*; command is run with a bad parameter, Nova-api
    should not throw a stack trace.  For example:
    
    'nova aggregate-details badID' shouldn't cause a stack trace
    
    fix bug 1053150
    
    Change-Id: Iab6059f44b7cfb5428a2b55cea53d63809d7a575
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit 6c1b2d6c19193a8b8f89e0fe934762741ef5c777
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 19 22:27:20 2012 +0000

    No stack trace on bad nova aggregate-* command
    
    When a 'nova aggregate-*; command is run with a bad parameter, Nova-api
    should not throw a stack trace.  For example:
    
    'nova aggregate-details badID' shouldn't cause a stack trace
    
    fix bug 1053150
    
    Change-Id: Iab6059f44b7cfb5428a2b55cea53d63809d7a575
    (cherry picked from commit 6ebe7fd5f0c3fbe9b409f643237be837c5266dea)
